-              "INSERT INTO Singers (SingerId, FirstName, LastName)\n"

nodes.bodyText:
(It's not specifically added in this change, so I assume that it is more of a general question for all these samples)
No really specific reason, other than that it is quite customary to have the VALUES (...) clause on a new line. See for example the examples here: https://cloud.google.com/spanner/docs/dml-syntax#insert_examples
